## Test the Assignment System
### 1. Launch the App - App opens to login/splash screen - Login with your credentials
### 2. Navigate to Assignments - Tap the **"Assignments"** tab in bottom navigation - You should see: - Statistics card (shows 0 tests initially) - 3 test mode cards: 1. **Subject-wise Practice** 2. **GS Paper Mock Test** 3. **Topic-wise Practice** - **Test History** button at top
### 3. Test Subject-wise Mode - Tap "Subject-wise Practice" - See list of subjects with question counts - Tap any subject (e.g., History) - Quiz loads with 15 random questions - Timer starts at 30:00
### 4. Quiz Features to Test - ✅ Navigate between questions (Previous/Next) - ✅ Select answer options - ✅ Clear response button - ✅ Mark for review checkbox - ✅ Tap menu icon to see question grid - ✅ Question grid shows colored states - ✅ Submit button works - ✅ Submit confirmation dialog appears - ✅ Timer counts down
### 5. Test Results - ✅ Score displays correctly - ✅ Statistics show (correct/wrong/skipped) - ✅ Progress bars display - ✅ Performance chart shows - ✅ Time taken displays
### 6. Test Solutions - ✅ "View Solutions" button works - ✅ All questions display - ✅ Correct answers highlighted in green - ✅ Wrong answers highlighted in red - ✅ Explanations show - ✅ Filter tabs work (All/Correct/Wrong/Skipped)
### 7. Test History - ✅ Go back to Assignments screen - ✅ Tap "Test History" button - ✅ See your completed test - ✅ Statistics updated
### 8. Test Other Modes - ✅ Try GS Paper Mock Test - ✅ Try Topic-wise Practice - ✅ Verify all work similarly

## Important: JSON Files
### ⚠️ REQUIRED for Questions to Load
You need JSON question files in: ``` app/src/main/assets/assignments/ ├── history/ (at least 1 .json file) ├── polity/ (at least 1 .json file) ├── economy/ (at least 1 .json file) ├── geography/ (at least 1 .json file) └── ethics/ (at least 1 .json file) ```
**If you don't have these files yet:** The app will show "0 questions available" for those subjects.
**JSON File Format:** ```json { "test_metadata": { "test_id": "test_001", "test_title": "Test Name", "subject": "history", "gs_paper": "GS I", "unit": "Unit Name", "sub_topic": "Topic Name", "total_questions": 15, "total_marks": 30, "difficulty": "Medium", "tags": ["tag1"] }, "questions": [ { "q_id": "q1", "question_number": 1, "question_text": "Question text here?", "question_type": "single_choice", "options": [ {"option_id": "A", "option_text": "Option A"}, {"option_id": "B", "option_text": "Option B"}, {"option_id": "C", "option_text": "Option C"}, {"option_id": "D", "option_text": "Option D"} ], "correct_answer": "A", "explanation": "Explanation here", "marks": 2, "difficulty": "Medium", "topic_tag": "topic_name" } ] } ```
---
## Features Working
### ✅ Test Modes: - **Subject-wise**: Test on individual subjects - **GS Paper**: Full paper tests (GS I/II/III/IV) - **Topic-wise**: Specific unit/topic practice
### ✅ Quiz Features: - 15 random questions per test - 30-minute countdown timer - Question navigation (Previous/Next) - Question grid overview - Mark for review - Clear response - Auto-submit on timer expiry - Submit confirmation
### ✅ Scoring: - Correct: +2 marks - Wrong: -0.66 marks (1/3 negative marking) - Skipped: 0 marks - Total out of 30
### ✅ Results: - Detailed score breakdown - Statistics charts - Progress bars - Time taken - Percentage
### ✅ Solutions: - View all questions - Filter by correct/wrong/skipped - Explanations - Color-coded answers
### ✅ History: - Save all attempts - View past tests - Sort by recent/highest - Overall statistics
